law.catch_line: Employer to furnish employee with statement of wage deductions.
law.text: All employers who employ ten (10) or more and pay their employees by check or otherwise, making deductions from the salaries and wages due said employees, shall state specifically the amount for which the deductions are made, and each such employer at the time of payment of salary or wage to each employee shall furnish the employee a statement giving the amount of each deduction and the general purpose for which the deduction is made.
